de.mpa.analysis

Class UniProtUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mpa.analysis.UniProtUtilities

  • public class UniProtUtilities
extends Object
    Class to access the EBI UniProt WebService.
    Author:
    R. Heyer

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  UniProtUtilities.Keyword
      Helper class for wrapping UniProt keyword-based ontology entries.
      static class  UniProtUtilities.KeywordCategory
      Enumeration holding ontology keywords.
      static class  UniProtUtilities.TaxonomyRank
      Enumeration holding taxonomic ranks.

      • getCommonUniprotEntry

                                                    Map<Long,Taxonomy> taxonomyMap,
                                                    TaxonomyUtils.TaxonomyDefinition tax_def)
        Method to generate the common ancestor Uniprot entry
        Parameters:
        upEntries. - A list with UniProtMPAentries.
        taxnonmyMap. - The full taxonomy map necessary for finding common ancestor taxonomies.
        tax_def, - TaxonomyDefinition used to create a common taxonomy (common ancestor or most specific)
        Returns:
